ASentientBot

asentientbot@gmail.com • ASentientBot#0323 • @ASentientBot

archival

I'm a bit of a data hoarder and have collected over 40 TB of content that interests me. I image CDs, mirror websites, and occasionally copy screensavers from Apple Store demo machines. I aim to preserve an offline copy of everything I use.

I've shared a subset on my Internet Archive profile.
